note.p: This is a conversion of an orginal GAME BOY User Manaul into an XML-based PDF.
I used Oxygen XML Editor and Canva.com for editing purposes.
The github repository for this file can be found here.
The GAME BOY User Manual is sourced from Internet Archive.
I copied the images (as screenshots) from the manual and touched them up via a premium account on canva.com.
I attempted to keep the wording and formatting exactly how it appeared in the orginal manaul but I did reformat a tables.
